original_title: Vampire Blob - Silent Fangs of Horror
overview: Beware, O viewers! For upon you has fallen the curse of Vampire Blob!! Fear, for what you see here, the corruption of a politician's daughter, the death of an Opium addict, the fall of a rich socialite and a chicken tender, may HAUNT YOU FOREVER!!!
title: Vampire Blob - Silent Fangs of Horror
